text: The subdivisions of Paris refer to the administrative and geographic divisions within the city of Paris, France. Paris is primarily divided into 20 arrondissements, which are further broken down into quartiers (neighborhoods) for administrative and local governance purposes. These subdivisions play a key role in the cityâ€™s organization, allowing for effective management of services and representation of residents. == Related pages == * Arrondissements of Paris == References == == Other websites == * Paris City Official Site Category:Subdivisions of France Category:Paris
title: Subdivisions of Paris
